comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content:
Máximo Marcelo Torcuato de Alvear Pacheco (October 4, 1868 – March 23, 1942), better known as Marcelo T. de Alvear was an Argentine politician and President of Argentina from October 12, 1922 to October 12, 1928.

We are back in a 1922 tranche again.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Richard Arthur Norton: Thanks for the additional information here.  We'll include it next time we update the description.
